article_title: People hate shopping for health insurance
article_text:
(AP file Photo)

Getting a cavity filled. Doing your taxes. Sitting on a middle seat of the airplane. What do all those things have in common?

In the minds of Americans, they’re all preferable activities to shopping for health insurance.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Kathryn Mayer
article_metadata.description: According to Bankrate, 64 percent of respondents to a survey said shopping for health insurance is as bad or worse than having a tooth filled.
